Deathly Retort.name: Deathly Retort
Deathly Retort.flavor: Your soul lashes out with necrotic energy at one who would harm you.
Deathly Retort.trigger: A creature within 20 squares of you hits you with an attack.
Deathly Retort.attack:
Your highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Your highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Fortitude
Deathly Retort.onHit: The target takes necrotic damage equal to the damage you took from the attack.

Haunting Form.name: Haunting Form
Haunting Form.flavor: You adopt a ghostly form to achieve your vengeful aims.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You gain insubstantial, phasing, and fly 6 (hover, maximum altitude 2 squares) until the end of your next turn.

Sustain Standard: If you don’t sustain this power, you can land as a free action.
Haunting Form.effect: You gain insubstantial, phasing, and fly 6 (hover, maximum altitude 2 squares) until the end of your next turn.
Haunting Form.sustainStandard: If you don’t sustain this power, you can land as a free action.

Death Locus.name: Death Locus
Death Locus.flavor: After an initial burst of black, life-sapping energy, your body is flooded with a killing darkness that is attracted to those it initially touched.
Death Locus.attack: Your highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Fortitude
Death Locus.onHit: 5d8 + your highest ability modifier necrotic damage, and if the target attacks you, it takes half the damage it deals you as necrotic damage (save ends).
Death Locus.onMiss: Half damage, and if the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, the target takes half the damage it deals you as necrotic damage.
